Peters et al. (2011): Updated from Peters, GP, Minx, JC, Weber, L, and Edenhofer, O. 2011. Growth in emission transfers via international trade from 1990 to 2008. Proceedings of the National Academy of Sciences USA doi:10.1073/pnas.1006388108

The use of data is conditional on citing the original data sources. Data for years 2011 and 2012 are preliminary.
